  • Description: 1 x plastic jerrican UN2920 overpacked in non UN specification fibreboard outer package. inner package leaked slightly. Observed minor damage to corner of outer package. spill cleaned locally and secured in salvage drum pending further disposition

item.title: Report X-2024051491
item.description:
Report X-2024051491

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-12T15:12:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-12
  • City: BELLEVUE
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: NORFOLK SOUTHERN RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 1
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: NS personnel found tank car GATX2715 leaking product from the top of the car. Upon inspection by a contractor, the leak was found to be coming from the liquid line blind flange. All the bolts on the blind flange were found to be loose. The flange was properly tightened to stop the leak. The car was held to allow a certified shop inspect the flange bolts for damage.

item.title: Report X-2024051408
item.description:
Report X-2024051408

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-06T15:13:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-19
  • City: COLUMBUS
  • State: OH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A HAZMAT LEAKER IN THE UNLOAD. USING THE DECISION TREE, CORROSIVE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET AND ALL APLICABLE PPE, PACKAGE AND RELATED SPILL WERE REMOVED TO THE PSC AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.
